name: 星塔星夜MONOBEHEVO
description:
Use different fighting skills in beautiful scenes to deal with different types of enemy combinations.


A variety of mysterious and rich natural landforms and traps.


It has two attack methods: close combat and far distance, using long-range weapons to attack enemy weaknesses or dismantle traps.


A fierce BOSS battle that inspires adrenaline.

▲twitter：@MONOBEHEVO
▲youtube：@monobehevo

Creation Original intention:
"I'm very busy, I don't have much time, I want to experience one after get off work tonight
Complete, beautiful, happy, two-dimensional action game that doesn’t force me to watch the plot"

Game features:
《MONOBEHEVO》 is "Star Tower star night Star Cinema". It is an action breakthrough game with few keys. In the game, you will accompany the exiled soldier (mono) through key hours. There is no need to rotate the viewing angle, only one direction.

origin of name:
The full name is "Star Tower Starry Night Star Cinema", a huge screen surrounded by thousands of star towers in the center. It is an excellent screen for the Global Hotel in the sky.
